name: Eldritch Crossing
description:
Eldritch Crossing was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50 (Delay the Inevitable).

“There are eldritch horrors manifesting in your basement!
Use your holy symbol to banish the evil runes that keep appearing everywhere.
You might just be able delay your inevitable end...”

Playing the Game
  • Move: WASD or Left Stick
  • Look: Mouse or Right Stick
  • Crouch (Hold): Shift or Trigger
  • Crouch (Toggle): C (Keyboard) or B (Gamepad)

Point your holy symbol at a rune to banish it. Keep an eye on your health bar! Allowing a rune to manifest will drain your health, but successfully banishing a rune will replenish it.

Credits

A game by Emmy and Thomas.

Music
Big Drumming Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7524-big-drumming
